llm.model: bound=ChatOpenAI(client=<openai.resources.chat.completions.completions.Completions object at 0x10a50c890>, async_client=<openai.resources.chat.completions.completions.AsyncCompletions object at 0x10adf4690>, root_client=<openai.OpenAI object at 0x10a50c150>, root_async_client=<openai.AsyncOpenAI object at 0x10adf4210>, model_name='openai/gpt-oss-20b', temperature=0.3, model_kwargs={}, openai_api_key=SecretStr('**********'), openai_api_base='http://gate04.cfa.handels.gu.se:8787/v1', request_timeout=900.0, max_retries=0) kwargs={} config={} config_factories=[]
llm.feedback:
Remove every reference to NDX, ust10y, CNY, and any other non‑DXY asset.  Keep only the DXY‑focused lines.  Re‑format the “Up/Down” lines to the exact required syntax:  
**Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %**  
Use the existing citations (4)(5)(2)(1) and (Z7O1DCHS7) only where the fact is stated; drop any placeholder citations that refer to removed assets.  For the swing‑trade plan, rewrite the single line to match the template:  
**Direction | Horizon | Entry | Stop | Target | R/R | Invalidation | Trigger | Probability % | Confidence 0–100**  
Example:  
*Sell | 2025‑09‑02→2026‑03‑31 | 104.0 | 106.0 | 102.0 | 2:1 | Fed dovish stance or tariff rollback | Fed minutes, tariff enforcement pace | 40 % | 70*  
Ensure the entry, stop, and target are expressed in DXY points, the trigger and invalidation are tied to the same catalysts, and the probability reflects the evidence (e.g., 40 % for the base‑case DXY decline).  Delete all lines that mention other handles (NDX, ust10y, CNY, etc.) or that do not map to a canonical handle with a sign and magnitude.  Finally, keep the “Confidence” field only in the trade line and remove any extraneous narrative or duplicated content.
